name: Kava
origin: Pacific Islands (Fiji, Vanuatu, Tonga, Samoa, Hawaii)
cultural_notes: Traditional ceremonial drink made from kava root. Produces relaxation without intoxication. Central to Pacific Islander culture. The kava circle is a sacred social space.
manufacturing_notes: Root pounded and mixed with water
legal_notes: Legal in most places, regulated in some

name: Flavored Malt Beverages (Gulf)
cultural_notes: Non-alcoholic malt beverages popular in Gulf countries as an alternative to beer. Brands like Barbican and Holsten. Widely available and socially accepted.
manufacturing_notes: Brewed like beer, then alcohol removed
